# scam.wiki — General Scam Database

> Community-powered database of general scams. Search, vote, report, and protect yourself. Exposing fraud in the general industry.


scam.wiki is a community-driven scam exposure platform focused on the general industry. Features a searchable database of known scams with risk levels, community voting, reporting tools, and educational resources. Users can search scams, vote on severity, share warnings on social media, and report new scams.


## Pages

- [Homepage — General scam database and community reports](https://scam.wiki)


## Keywords

general scams, scam database, fraud alert, scam warning, scam.wiki
